thread.title: The best hilton I have ever tried - Review
thread.title_full: The best hilton I have ever tried - Review of Hilton Paris Opera, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: xyz838
title: The best hilton I have ever tried - Review
text:
I am a frequent guest in the Hilton around the world and this one in Paris is by far the best I have ever experienced.
It merges the Hilton standards with the touch of Parisienne.
Great location , very nice building, fantastic service and all the usual qualities of Hilton.
